NDSI_Snow_Cover.title: Gridded NDSI snow cover and data flag values.

NDSI_Snow_Cover_Basic_QA.title: A general estimate of the quality of the algorithm result.

NDSI_Snow_Cover_Algorithm_Flags_QA.title: Algorithm-specific bit flags set for data screens and for inland water.

NDSI.title: Raw NDSI values (i.e. prior to screening).

Snow_Albedo_Daily_Tile.title: Daily snow albedo corresponding to the NDSI_Snow_Cover parameter.

orbit_pnt.title: Pointer to the orbit of the swath mapped into each grid cell.

granule_pnt.title: Pointer for identifying the swath mapped into each grid cell.
